title: Studio Apartment Available August
posting_body: Welcome to Toscana, a remarkable community of apartment homes centrally located in Arvada, CO.
Toscana features stunning studio, one- and two-bedroom apartments.
Our pet-friendly apartments are nestled in a lovely community with a sparkling pool and gorgeous landscaping.
Every inch of our studio, one- and two-bedroom apartments in Westminster, CO is crafted with your lifestyle in mind.
Lose yourself in an Italian dream when you lease one of our unique Toscana apartments.
Call us or stop by our leasing office today to schedule your tour of our studio, one- and two-bedroom floor plans.
- Select apartments showcase mirrored, walk-in closets and grand vaulted ceilings.
-- Clothes Care Center with On-Site Laundry Facility
- Steps from Bus Line & Light Rail Line
Toscana is open for tours and appointments.
The leasing office is located at 8490 N. Sheridan blvd.
We are on the west-facing side of the street off Sheridan Boulevard.
Toscana is a tax-credit property and apartments are income-restricted.
To qualify, each household must earn a minimum of 2.5 times the rent.
